title: Fact Check: Old picture of Ramzan kits issued by Telangana government shared as recent | Newsmobile
author: newsmobile.in
vclaim:
A picture of a pink coloured bag with ‘Eid Mubarak Ramzan Gift’ written on it, is doing the rounds on social media. It is being claimed that the Telangana Government is distributing special Ramzan kits to Muslims.

The same post was shared by several social media users. Such posts can be seen here, here and here.

ALSO READ: Rahul Gandhi did not trip in this picture; here’s the truth

NewsMobile fact-checked the above posts and found that the claim attached to the picture is misleading.

We started our investigation by putting the picture through Reverse Image Search, which led us to a blog post dated July 9, 2015, featuring the same picture of the bag.

We also found a Facebook post dated July 09, 2015, which featured the same picture.

Meanwhile, Telangana Chief Minister, K Chandrashekar Rao, on May 05th, 2020, announced that there will be no distribution of Ramzan kits this year, due to COVID-19.

Hence, the above information proves that the viral picture in question is OLD and no Ramzan kits have been distributed by the Telangana government this year.

However, NewsMobile cannot independently verify the origin of the picture.

If you want to fact-check any story, WhatsApp it now on +91 88268 00707
